alert.note: Alert for Baldwin (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 08 at 12:53PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Flood Advisory for... Central Baldwin County in southwestern Alabama... * Until 400 PM CDT. * At 1253 PM CDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain has fallen and additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected. * Some locations that will experience flooding include... Bay Minette, Stapleton, Douglasville, D`Olive, Vangordon, Whitehouse Forks, Carney, Crossroads, Pine Haven, Phillipsville, Dyas and Bromley.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
